code: @Test @RunAsClient public void testWithPath(@ArquillianResource URL url) throws Exception {     assertThat(IOHelper.loadText(new URL(url, "camel/say/hello").openStream()), is(equalTo("Hello World!\n"))). }

@Test @RunAsClient public void testWithUriTemplate(@ArquillianResource URL url) throws Exception {     assertThat(IOHelper.loadText(new URL(url, "camel/say/hello/Antonin").openStream()), is(equalTo("Hello Antonin, I'm CamelContext(hello)!\n"))). }
